```py
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
%matplotlib inline
```

```py
def CMatrix(CM, labels=['pay', 'default']):
    df = pd.DataFrame(data=CM, index=labels, columns=labels)
    df.index.name='TRUE'
    df.columns.name='PREDICTION'
    df.loc['Total'] = df.sum()
    df['Total'] = df.sum(axis=1)
    return df
```
